response.overview: When the Bad Guys, a crew of criminal animals, are finally caught after years of heists and being the world’s most-wanted villains, Mr. Wolf brokers a deal to save them all from prison.
response.tagline: Good is no fun at all.
response.title: The Bad Guys

titles.title: Pan Wilk i spółka. Bad Guys
